@jorisvandenbossche @TomAugspurger ok ready. this was a PITA. seems we were not testing some versions of mpl

> I think we use the latest of deps (it actually use many deps though IIRC)

Ahh, yeah I think you're correct.
if anyone wants to further bump mpl, let's open an issue about that.
